title: Edmund Lester
text: Edmund Lester was an English professional <a href="association%20football">footballer</a> who played as a centre forward. He played for <a href="Lancashire%20League%20%28football%29">Lancashire League</a> club <a href="Fleetwood%20Rangers%20F.C.">Fleetwood Rangers</a> before moving to <a href="Football%20League%20First%20Division">Football League First Division</a> side <a href="Burnley%20F.C.">Burnley</a> in March 1898. He played his only senior match for Burnley on 1 April 1899 in the 1–0 defeat away at <a href="Sheffield%20Wednesday%20F.C.">Sheffield Wednesday</a>. Lester left the club in May 1899, and his whereabouts thereafter are untraced.
